select_user_count: select count(*) as n from AccountInformation where id=%s
select_user: select count(*) as p from AccountInformation where id=%s and password='%s'
select_ecount: select count(*) as n from AccountInformation where email='%s'
select_e_c: select id from AccountInformation where email='%s'
update_c: UPDATE AccountInformation set Password='%s' where id=%s
select_wid: SELECT WeiboInformation.WeiboId as id from WeiboInformation where id=%s and time='%s' and WeiBoContext='%s';
select_u_id: select name from AccountInformation where id=%s
select_w_c: SELECT count(*) as n from WeiboInformation WHERE id=%s
select_cid: SELECT CommentId  from WeiboComment where WeiboId='%s' and FromId='%s' and ToId='%s' and CommentContext='%s';
select_count_wb: SELECT count(*) as n from WeiboInformation where id=%s
update_head_img: update AccountInformation set headImg='%s' where id='%s'
select_friends_weibo: SELECT WeiboId,Id,Time,LikeCount,WeiBoContext from WeiboInformation where %s  ORDER BY Time desc
sel_interest_wb: select WeiboId,Id,Time,LikeCount,WeiBoContext from WeiboInformation where %s  ORDER BY Time desc
sel_interest: select search,`write` from UserInterest where userid=%s
